title: Gillette Fusion5 Power Mens Razor Blade Refills, 8 Count, Lubrastrip for a More Comfortable Shave,Gillette Fusion 5 Blades Refills, Gillette Razors for Men, Gillette Fusion 5, Razor Blades for Men
description: Get the precision of a Gillette shave with comfort and style. The Gillette Fusion5 Power razor blades feature 5 antifriction blades that are positioned closely together for incredible comfort and a shave you barely feel. These razor blades also feature an indicator lubrastrip which fades when you are no longer getting an optimal shave. Soft microfins help to smooth and stretch skin before the blades preparing hairs to be cut. Use the precision trimmer on the back for hard-to-reach places and styling facial hair. Not sure if these blades will fit your existing razor handle? All Gillette 5-blade razor handles will fit these Fusion5 Power razor blades (excluding GilletteLabs).
